casebody.data:
Case No. 6,798. GREGG v. BONTZ. [2 Cranch, C. C. 115.] 1 Circuit Court, District of Columbia. Nov. Term, 1815. In Alexandria, D. C., the statute of limitations may be pleaded on setting aside tlio oiiiee judgment at the first term. Act Ya. Dec. 12, 1798, § 28. E. J. Lee, for defendant.

Limitation or Actions — Pleading Statute.

THRUSTON, Circuit Judge, absent.
